name: Inside the Monarchy
description: Inside the Monarchy is a a game where you manage a kingdom. You can trade with other nations with goods you produce, build structures in your capital to boost profits and population happiness and create an army to defend yourself from raids and take over the continent of Avarion by conquering all of your rivals. Beware though - if the happiness of your people drops below 0, it could have dire consequences for your kingdom  - and your life...
